title: Sesquiterpenoids and hexanorcucurbitacin from Aquilaria malaccensis agarwood with anti-inflammatory effects by inhibiting the STAT1/AKT/MAPK/NLRP3 pathway
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,9391-9405
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08686K, Paper

Chi Thanh Ma, Tianqi Huang, Jae Sik Yu, Tu Loan Ly, Kim Long Vu Huynh, Sung Won Kwon, Jeong Hill Park, Hyun Ok Yang
A rare hexanortriterpenoid significantly attenuated the proinflammatory mediators, STAT1/AKT/MAPK, and MAPK/NLRP3 signaling pathways for preventing neuroinflammatory disorders in BV2 microglial cells.
